item.description:
"Engineering meets Biology: A view to the future"

When: Thursday, May 31, 2012 | 5:45 pm - 9:00 pm

Where: Charles Stark Draper Laboratory, Hill Building, Room 1409, 1 Hampshire Street, Cambridge MA

Learn more and register on the Event Webpage. Please register in advance online

 

http://www.bmes.org/aws/BMES/pt/sd/calendar/19958/_PARENT/layout_details/false

 

The Biomedical Engineering Society (BMES) Boston Industry Chapter and Charles Stark Draper Laboratory would like to invite you to the "Engineering meets Biology: A view to the future" presentation and networking event. There will be an hour of networking and hors d'oeuvres, a presentation and additional networking with desert afterwards.

 

Questions? Please contact Stephen Pittman (bmesprofessional@gmail.com) or call (617) 258-1000.
item.name: "Engineering meets Biology: A view to the future"
